entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:15 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:15 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 8:15 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
